name: Shiva's Guard
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

descriptions.name: Arctic Blast
descriptions.description: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.Radius: 900

descriptions.name: Freezing Aura
descriptions.description: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45. Radius: 900

notes: The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
